title: disconnected from game when wifi is working. cant rejoin game
body: i was in a ranked game for the first 3 minutes or so and then i disconnected. i tried relogging in and i cant rejoin. i tried restarting my computer it still doesnt let me rejoin. i also have the league of legends logo on the middle of my screen. why is this happening. gee im losing my lp :/

replies.body: Thanks, we're seeing quite a bit of reports about this and looking into it now.
